data.title: CampaignReport 05 AUG 22 PRINT - University Hospital Foundation
data.meta_description: CampaignReport 05 AUG 22 PRINT - University Hospital Foundation
data.text: 2004/2005 Donor Recognition The University Hospital Foundation gratefully acknowledges the generosity of the following donors who made gifts from April 1, 2004 to May 31, 2005. Gifts to the Alberta Heart Institute start on page 22 Gifts to the Guru Nanak Dev Healing Garden start on page 26 $600,000 plus (Cash) Muriel Robins (Estate) $300,000 plus (Cash) Gwen Garson (Estate) Dan & Bunny Widney $250,000 plus (Cash) Anonymous Anonymous (Estate) $200,000 plus (Cash) Landmark Group of Builders Margaret Zeidler-Boyer $150,000 plus (Cash) George Ensell (Estate) $100,000 plus (Cash) Allard Foundation Firefighters’ Burn Treatment Society - Edmonton Chapter John & Barbara Poole $90,000 plus (Cash) Anonymous (Estate) Olga Pollock (Estate) Fred Vincett (Estate) & Mil Vincett $60,000 plus (Cash) Eric C.
